## 🐛 Bug Fix Summary

- What problem does this fix?
- How was it discovered?

## 🔧 Solution Details

- What was changed to resolve the issue?
- Any side effects or risks?

## ✅ Checklist
- [ ] Conventional commit subject (fix: ...)
- [ ] Tests added/updated
- [ ] Docs updated (if needed)
- [ ] Linked issues (if any)

- Fixes #
- Related to #
